name: 林哲宇
objective:
The purposes of the present lecture would be: 
Basics of joining processes (principles/species)
Welding metallurgy (melting/heat-affected zone/microstructure)
Fundamental understanding of joint characterization/evaluation
Principle and application of welding processes
Organization and presentation skills in English throughout the literature review
schedule:
Week 1: Opening of the present lecture
Week 2-4: Regular lecture (introduction to joining/welding)
Week 5-8: Case study
Week 9: Midterm paper report
Week 10-17: Paper report session
Week 18: Final paper report
scorePolicy:
Midterm paper report (20%)
Case report (30%)
Literature review presentation (20%)
Final paper report (20%)
Attendance (10%)
materials:
Self-arranged PowerPoint slides are mainly utilized to implement, and the resources are:
Welding metallurgy and weldability, J.C. Lippold, Wiley
Metallurgy of welding, J. F. Lancaster, Abington Publishing 
Welding metallurgy, Sindo Kou, Wiley
Soldering, brazing & welding, Derek Pritchard, Crowood Press
Introduction to metal-ceramic technology, W. Patrick Naylor, DDS, MPH
The Welding Institute (TWI) website
remarks: ※一級、二級：實體授課。※三級 (含) 以上：遠距授課。授課使用 Microsoft teams 或 google meet 及校內網路學園教學，上課網址將公佈於此。
